text: The Korean War Memorial is a monument commemorating those who fought in the Korean War, installed outside the Veterans Building in Salem, Oregon, United States, which houses the offices of the Oregon Department of Veterans' Affairs. ==See also== * List of Korean War memorials ==References== Category:Korean War memorials and cemeteries Category:Monuments and memorials in Salem, Oregon Category:Outdoor sculptures in Salem, Oregon
title: Korean War Memorial (Salem, Oregon)
